display_long_description:
Your personal trainer, right in your living room. Best-of-class quality, filled with fun content, and the best price you’ll find.

**GET FIT WHILE HAVING FUN**

Do you love action-packed rhythm games that get you moving without even realizing you're working out? Feel healthier and fitter instantly – this is for you!

[media]

**MOTIVATION REDEFINED**

Work out with an AI coach so lifelike, you might forget they’re not real. (They won’t text you back, though.) Even fitness icon Daisy Keech is available as your personal trainer - and with over 800 super cool customization options, you can build a coach that’s basically your dream workout buddy. Tons of DLC, too. Because why not?

**LOADED WITH CONTENT & FEATURES**

xFIT is our most advanced, feature-packed fitness app yet – with breathtaking Unreal Engine 5 environments that set a new standard for visual excellence in fitness games - or you can turn your living room into a fun, interactive workout zone in **Mixed Reality!**

[media]

**SOCIAL PLATFORM**

Stay connected and motivated with real-time multiplayer modes, live leaderboards, replay video editors and more. Fitness is better together!


**FITTER THAN EVER**

More than rhythmic action — xFIT offers 64 challenges, 8 pro-level programs, and wellness routines for recovery, posture, and flexibility. Track your progress with detailed dashboards and enjoy a full-body workout that keeps you feeling great.

Feel the joy of a healthier you - starting today.
